moves.name: Eerie Impulse
moves.description: The user's body generates an eerie impulse. Exposing the target to it harshly lowers the target's Sp. Atk stat.

moves.name: Electrify
moves.description: If the target is electrified before it uses a move during that turn, the target's move becomes Electric type.

moves.name: Razor Wind
moves.description: A two-turn attack. Blades of wind hit opposing Pokémon on the second turn. Critical hits land more easily.

moves.name: Quick Attack
moves.description: The user lunges at the target at a speed that makes it almost invisible. It is sure to strike first.

moves.name: Thunder
moves.description: A wicked thunderbolt is dropped on the target to inflict damage. It may also leave the target with paralysis.

moves.name: Charge
moves.description: The user boosts the power of the Electric move it uses on the next turn. It also raises the user's Sp. Def stat.

moves.name: Parabolic Charge
moves.description: The user attacks everything around it. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by those hit.
